text.div:
West Nile Virus Infection (Tests for West Nile virus IgG or Total Antibody [Qualitative])

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org

    29566-7 West Nile virus IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
